text:
GLG | Senior/Principle Software Engineer | Full-time REMOTE or ONSITE (Austin, NY, Boston) | https://glg.it/careers/engineering/ GLG connects a network of over 600,000 experts with clients via phone consultations. We are aggressively hiring Senior Engineers and higher with very competitive compensation and have teams working on Search/Matching, Machine Learning recommendations, Council Member Management, Backend Ops, and more. The interview is a one hour show and tell of a software project you wrote followed by a one hour lunch.

Some technologies we use:

* SQL Server

* Node/JS

* Angular, React

* Python (Machine Learning)

* Elastic Search

Please email me resumes/questions: dcoleman@glgroup.com
